alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Canyon; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 5:17PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Showers with strong winds will impact portions of western Big Horn, east central Carbon, eastern Musselshell, central Yellowstone, northern Rosebud and western Treasure Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 515 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with strong winds, extending from 10 miles northwest of Melstone to Huntley to 7 miles west of Pryor. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hardin, Hysham, Custer, Melstone, Huntley, Pryor, Worden, Fort Smith, Ballantine, Musselshell, Pompeys Pillar, Bighorn, Ingomar, St. Xavier and Crow Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains; Southeastern Carbon; Southern Big Horn; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure
